Awards & Appreciations

Recognition Gallery

Excellence in e-Governance

Maharashtra's Information Technology Department has been consistently recognized for its innovative e-governance initiatives, digital transformation projects, and citizen-centric services. Our awards showcase the state's commitment to leveraging technology for better governance.
